name: CIDetector
desc: An image processor that identifies notable features (such as faces and barcodes) in a still image or video.

items.name: init?(ofType: String, context: CIContext?, options: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a configured detector.

items.name: func features(in: CIImage) -> [CIFeature]
items.desc: Searches for features in an image.

items.name: func features(in: CIImage, options: [String : Any]?) -> [CIFeature]
items.desc: Searches for features in an image based on the specified image orientation.
